TopicTitle: I think A Weird 0.25 ksp Bug?

Articles.Content:
so i was super excited for the new update for obvious reason (blowing up buildings) when i saw on
the map something odd so i went to investigate as always and it is weird i don't really know what it is
(why i hinted at it being a virus (not a game virus btw) can any body can help? i think it is something to
with the mods i have installed at the moment and they might not like the update but i don't know for sure?

thank you for any help
Looking up close at the supposed virus, it looks like city lights.

Yea, it's pritty odd. I had the same thing

I thought it was a mod thing, and it went away after I updated texture replacer though. Are you in stock?

Yea, it's pritty odd. I had the same thing

I thought it was a mod thing, and it went away after I updated texture replacer though. Are you in stock?

No I had mods installed at the time I saw this

This looks like a bug that's being discussed in the EVE thread. While I haven't tried it out myself yet, apparently those who have are reporting that city lights don't display correctly, or at all. In your case it seems they are simply covering the whole surface.

In the future, please post mod-related bugs (or any bugs on a modded install, unless you're certain it's a stock bug) in the Mod Support forum.

This looks like a bug that's being discussed in the EVE thread. While I haven't tried it out myself yet, apparently those who have are reporting that city lights don't display correctly, or at all. In your case it seems they are simply covering the whole surface.

In the future, please post mod-related bugs (or any bugs on a modded install, unless you're certain it's a stock bug) in the Mod Support forum.

Ok thank you. do you know how I can move it?
You can't AFAIK, but a mod should pass by and straighten it up sooner or later.
Ok thank you for all your help
Yeah, looks like a corrupted nightside texture to me.

I had this going on. In my case I think it was some other mod which was causing errors and causing the city light texture to screw up. I removed/updated some that hadn't been updated for .25 yet and it went away. I don't know which one it was and I am adding them back as they update. I'm currently running fine with the EVE install I had before .25 came out.

It's the Langoliers!

Ok thank you

Yes it's the city lights the mod I used was environmental visual enhancements I think? and I eventually got what happened on kerbin to happen on other planets eg Jool it's amazing say if you want to see it
I had to uninstall the mod but I hope they update it so I can use this lovely mod!
But I still love the bug it's Awsome to see the whole of kerbin infected
